[[module CSS]]
.wrapper {
    animation: dead 1s 0s linear infinite;
}
@keyframes dead {
    30%, 70% {
     text-shadow: #0008 0 0 0;
    }
    40% {
     text-shadow: #0008 0 0 3px;
    }
}
.wrapper .before, .wrapper .after {
    position: absolute;
    transition: opacity .39s;
}
.after {
    opacity: 0;
}
.before {
    z-index: 1;
}
.before:hover, .before:active {
    opacity: 0;
}
.before:hover + .after, .before:active + .after {
    opacity: 1;
}
[[/module]]
